form.title: Title
form.confirm: I confirm none of the {count} results below is the song I want.

alert.voteRunOut: You are not allowed to vote for more than {count} songs!
alert.voteNoSlot: You are not allowed to vote.

voteFailed.title: Vote failed.
voteFailed.description: An error occurred while voting, please refresh and try again. Error: {error}

unvoteFailed.title: Cancel vote failed.
unvoteFailed.description: An error occurred while cancelling vote, please refresh and try again. Error: {error}

nominateFailed.title: Add song failed.
nominateFailed.description: An error occurred while adding the song, please refresh and try again. Error: {error}
